content: bubu cardi by gingko b © 2025 materials needles 2 5 mm / us 1 5 circular needles gauge or size needed to meet gauge with a long enough cable for knitting magic loop most accurately calculated with a style swatch knit in flat in stockinette stitch given the small scale of the garment notions gauge is given in 1 inch square bor marker scrap yarn for placing sleeves on hold tapestry needle for weaving ends yarn fingering weight yarn is suggested for this pattern you will need 35 yds / 32 m or 8 g of yarn swatch yardage is not included yardage is based on yarn that is approximately 1 x 1 in / 2½ x 2½ cm 463yds per 100g more or less yardage 10 stitches x 12 row may bee needed based on yds per g pattern text in green boxes give instructions for one size the techniques in this pattern you can find a list of abbreviations on the last page cardigan | knitting ssk slip slip knit knit from the top down you will start with the slip 1 st knitwise slip 1 st purlwise insert lhn collar which is knit inside out so it can be into the front legs of both sts then knit them folded then you will knit the raglan increases together through the back loops you have now the shoulders will be increased on their own decreased 1 stitch before separating and knitting the body then the sleeves will be knit in the round using the k2tog knit 2 stitches together magic loop method insert rhn into the next 2 sts knitwise knit them together you have now decreased 1 stitch folded collar co 45 sts m1r make 1 stitch right insert lhn under the bar between the st you just knit and the next st on the needle from row 1 rs back to front knit through the front loop for a p1 *k1 p1* to end twisted stitch that leans right you have now increased 1 stitch row 2 ws - decrease row m1l make 1 stitch left k1 p1 ssk k1 *p1 k1* to last 4 sts k2tog p1 insert lhn under the bar between the st you k1 just knit and the next st on the needle from you now have 43 sts on the needles front to back knit through the back loop for a twisted stitch that leans left you have now increased 1 stitch row 3 rs p1 k1 p2 *k1 p1* to last 3 p1 k1 p1 row 2 ws *p1 k1* 2 times p to last 4 sts slipping row 4 ws - decrease row markers as you go *k1 p1* to end k1 p1 ssk p1 *k1 p1* to last 4 sts k2tog p1 k1 repeat until you have increased 5 times you now have 41 sts on the needles ending after a row 1 you now have 81 sts on the needles row 5 rs p1 *k1 p1*
